item.title: Fortnite - Unable to Download Supervised Settings
item.description: üîß Fixing SSL Certificate Verification Failure for Epic Online Services (EOS) linküìÑ Issue Overview linkWhile launching a game using Epic Online Services, I encountered repeated login failures in the logs, with errors like: [OnlineAccount.Logout:0][operation_succeeded] ... Result=[ELoginResult::SupervisedSettingsDownloadFailed (45)], FailedStep=[DownloadingSupervisedSettings], DisplayError=[Failed to download Supervised Settings.], DetailedError=[[1.1.1-3.4.1] no_connection (EOS_NoConnection)] Further down, the underlying issue became clear: libcurl error: 60 (SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate üîç Root Cause Summary linkThe game client could not establish a secure connection to the Epic backend API:
